title: Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 159 of 2014) is amended by the substitution of the
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Capital
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Capital 

Requirements) (Amendment) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 9 July 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (capital requirements) (amendment) regulation 2021 (2) regulation come operation 9 july 2021

title: Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 159 of 2014) is amended by the substitution of the
heading: 2. Regulation 5 of the European Union (Capital Requirements) (No. 2)
text_raw:
2. Regulation 5 of the European Union (Capital Requirements) (No. 2) 
Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 159 of 2014) is amended by the substitution of the 
following paragraph for paragraph (1): 

“(1) A person who provides the Bank with false, misleading or inaccurate 
information, knowing it to be false, misleading or inaccurate, or where he or she 
ought reasonably to have known the information was false, misleading or 
inaccurate, on his or her own behalf, or on behalf of any other person or 
institution, in relation to any requirement of, or under, Article 394, 430, 430a or 
430b of the Capital Requirements Regulation commits an offence.”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 July, 2021. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

1 OJ No. L. 176, 27.06.2013. p.1. 
2 OJ No. L. 150, 7.6.2019, p.1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th July, 2021.
